auth.page_sign_in_description: Authenticate with your command credentials to continue.
auth.page_sign_up_description: Create your command credentials to initialize your member profile.
cta.description: We recruit reliable profiles for combat, logistics support, industry, and reconnaissance. Discipline matters more than image.
cta.heading: Join a mission-focused organization.
cta.image_alt: Nexus Horizon Trade & Secure recruitment banner
features.card_1_desc: A clear hierarchy, explicit ranks, and defined responsibilities. Every operator knows who to report to and what they commit to.
features.card_2_desc: Preparation, execution, and debrief all follow one protocol. Missions are run with discipline, never improvised.
features.card_3_desc: Combat, logistics, exploration, and industrial support. Squads are organized to deploy the right force at the right moment.
features.card_4_desc: Field intel, controlled information flow, and decision-chain protection. Information control remains a priority.
features.heading: AN ORGANIZATION BUILT TO LAST
features.image_alt: Doctrine and fleet visual for Nexus Horizon Trade & Secure
features.section_label: // PILLARS OF NEXUS HORIZON TRADE & SECURE
footer.copyright: © 2954 Nexus Horizon Trade & Secure. All rights reserved.
footer.disclaimer: Star Citizen and RSI are trademarks of Roberts Space Industries Corp. Nexus Horizon Trade & Secure is an unofficial fan project.
footer.tagline: Multi-vector Star Citizen organization. Disciplined command and coordinated operations.
hero.description: Built to operate where others stop. Combat, strategic command, deep exploration, and industrial operations - Nexus Horizon Trade & Secure covers every vector with discipline, structure, and initiative. Every member is an operator. Every decision is a commitment.
hierarchy.aria_diagram: Hierarchy diagram: organization, squads, and members
hierarchy.heading: A CLEAR COMMAND STRUCTURE
hierarchy.paragraph_1: The structure is easy to understand: one central command, specialized squads, and clear responsibilities. Everyone knows where they stand and what they are expected to do.
hierarchy.paragraph_2: Squad leaders have real autonomy to manage their teams while staying aligned with organization rules. Result: less confusion, better coordination, and faster decisions.
member.dashboard_description: Authentication complete. Your command session is active and synchronized.
ops.bullet_1: Tactical briefings with roles and deployment windows
ops.bullet_3: Formalized debriefs to capitalize on every mission
ops.bullet_4: Permanent readiness of crews and fleet
ops.heading: THE OPERATIONAL RHYTHM OF NEXUS HORIZON TRADE & SECURE
ops.paragraph_1: Our campaigns are prepared like staff-level operations: explicit objectives, validated chain of command, and coordinated execution across specialized squads.
ops.paragraph_2: From tactical interception to multi-vector offensives, our doctrine stays the same: collective discipline, individual accountability, and systematic debrief after engagement.
portal.description: Authentication validated. Your operational session is now active.
portal.heading: NEXUS PORTAL COMMAND BRIDGE
